text: Kundryak () is a rural locality (a village) in Cherkassky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 2 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 40 km from Ufa, 6 km from Cherkassy. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Kundryak, Ufimsky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
